title: The Decoder Ring
description: Movie comprehension layer. Demonstratives, commands, street slang, and emotional exclamations. The final key to understanding Tamil media.

episodes.intro: Demonstratives. Like this. Like that. This one. That one. Same thing. Different thing. The words that point at reality.
episodes.scenario: 'Do it like this, not like that'. 'That shop, not this one'. 'Same place as yesterday?'. 'No, different street'. The six words that organize all of reality into this vs. that.

episodes.intro: Movie commands. Look! Listen! Be careful! Stop! Run! The informal imperative that drives every action scene.
episodes.scenario: Action movie vocab. 'Look out!' 'Listen to me!' 'Be careful!' 'Stop right there!' 'Run!'. The five commands that drive every Tamil movie climax.

episodes.intro: The informal register. The slang you hear between friends, in movies, and on the street. Use with care.
episodes.scenario: Friends at a cricket match. 'Dhoni is mass!'. 'You're killing it!'. Rival fan trash talks. 'Get lost!'. Understanding the register. When to use it (friends). When to NEVER use it (elders).

episodes.intro: The exclamations that punctuate every Tamil movie climax. Wow. Oh god. Tsk. Why like this? Pure emotion in sound.
episodes.scenario: Movie climax. Hero discovers the truth. 'Oh God!'. 'Why like this?'. Beautiful sunset. 'Wow!'. Plan goes wrong. 'Tsk'. The emotional punctuation of Tamil storytelling.

episodes.intro: A full movie scene described to you. Decode every word. Identify commands, emotions, demonstratives, and slang.
episodes.scenario: Hero enters. 'Look at this!' He shows something. 'That same person!' Villain appears. 'Stop!' 'Run!' 'Be careful!' 'Oh God, why like this?'. Friend says 'You're mass, go!' Hero turns around. 'Listen, I won't run'. Decode everything.

episodes.intro: Audit Day. Movie vocabulary: demonstratives, commands, slang, exclamations.
episodes.scenario: Rapid fire. I play a movie moment. You identify the word category: command, emotion, demonstrative, or slang.

episodes.intro: You have the vocabulary. Now use it. Which movie to watch first. How to use subtitles strategically. What to listen for. Your graduation mission.
episodes.scenario: Your first Tamil movie watch plan. Start with a comedy (easier dialogue). Watch with English subtitles first. Then Tamil subtitles. Then nothing. Listen for the words you know. The movie becomes your teacher. You have arrived.
